nodes.text: Founder's Day was a holiday celebrated by the Galactic Empire. In 6 BBY, Senior Administrator Lob Doluff threatened to roast Waywa Fybot, of the avian Quor'sav species, for Founder's Day if he failed to capture the wealthy lesai addict Bohhuah Mutdah.

Founder's Day was briefly mentioned in Lando Calrissian and the Flamewind of Oseon, a 1983 novel by L. Neil Smith. Many years later, an article from the in-universe HoloNet News entitled "Chatrunis Crowned Miss Coruscant", written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens, mentioned a Founder's Day Allegiance recited during the waning years on the Galactic Republic. Nonetheless, the source did not contain anything more than a nominal connection, leaving it ambiguous whether or not the reference was intentional.
